name: Oren Mckinney
text: Will definitely have my bike serviced here again.  Service was exceptional.  Everything was explained thoroughly with no hassle and service was done promptly.  Would recommend using these guys!!!

name: Junior Wolff
text:
Purchase a true TaoTao 125 ATV as well as a Kayo 150. They exceeded what the previous dealer in TX sent me..

We went trail riding yesterday and these youth sized atv’s went everywhere that the adult 1000 cc plus atv’s went. Even 3’ of water.

Impressive.

Don’t buy a Chinese bike over the internet that you cannot see, touch or test or you may be like me. Bait and switch and now fighting with the online dealer to take them back.

2 Wheel Heaven had exactly what I needed and now the boys are happy .

That is what counts.

If I could add a pic or video I would to show just how much mud we had on them.

name: Lisa Irwin
text: Very friendly. He worked with me on getting what I needed. Highly satisfied with the customer service and pricing.

resp.text: Thank you very much . We appreciate your business

name: gary duck
text: These people are great.

name: Jerry Pellegrini
text: Fantastic experience, great shop, friendly staff!  Nothing but satisfied!

resp.text: Thank u very much.. I am glad your boys are enjoying the ATVs . Be safe!!!

name: Jonathan King
text: Great first time experience. Will definitely be back in the near future! These guys will take care of you and make sure to answer every question with the proper knowledge and guidance. Super happy. Thanks again 👍👍👍

resp.text: Thank you. We really enjoyed talking with you and look forward to seeing you in the future. Thanks again

name: Tim Smith
text: Good people to deal with

resp.text: Thank u very much..

name: Jason Gray
text: These guys genuinely care about their customers. They have great prices on labor and financing to help anyone. Knowledgeable and very friendly. Highly recommend. A+++

name: Darrick English
text: This is an awesome place !!!! The customer service and professionalism is outstanding! I recommend everyone going through this business . It has been a great pleasure to purchase from you all !!

resp.text: Thank you very much.. We strive to make the experience outstanding.. we appreciate your business

name: Dana Crawford
text: Friendly service and I had my scooter back less than a week, I will definitely be going back to get them to service my bike as well.

resp.text: Thanks very much It was a pleasure hope to see you soon we appreciate your business

name: Daniel BUCKNER
text: I would gladly to business here,  if they don't have what you are looking for they will order it for you or they will go out of there way to find someone that does.  The worker here are very helpful and have a really good attitude!

resp.text: Thank u very much Here at 2 Wheel Heaven Powersports we strive to provide a positive experience and build lasting relationships

name: Air Tech Mechanical Contractors LLC
text: Awesome Deals on 4wheelers, ATV's, motorcycles, and accessories plus I'm very pleased with the service and repairs performed on my Harley at  2 Wheel Heaven. It was a pleasure doing business with you guys, thanks!

resp.text: It is always a pleasure working with you. Thank you for all the positive feedback we really appreciate it

name: Celeste Wilson
text: Great services,went there to get my granddaughter a helmet & the owner took his time to ensure she was comfortable with it & made sure it fitted as need be. I'll most definitely be returning for  the needs for any services needed.

resp.text: Thank you very much and I hope y'all enjoy the helmet

name: Matthew Browder
text: Super friendly staff and a great mechanic. This is the second time I have been for various maintenance stuff and couldn't get back to happier about prices and workmanship .

resp.text: Matthew ---thanks always a pleasure

name: justin mccormick
text: Fast service and a friendly staff. Will continue to do business with them.

resp.text: Thanks very much we appreciate your business

name: Joe Paul Abbott
text: Great Shop, Great Prices.

resp.text: Thank u very much we really appreciate it

name: Meghan Hotalen
text: Made my sons day! Went above and beyond from the second we walked in!!!

resp.text: Thank u very much .. it was our pleasure. I love seeing the kids excited about powersports

name: M B EXPEDITES, LLC
text: Customer oriented, goes out the way to accommodate the customer.

resp.text: Thank you very much we work hard to provide a positive experience

name: Mark Ritch
text: No one called me back

resp.text: Hey Mark I apologize we missed the call back please give us a call back at 205-473-0143 or provide me a number  and we will be more than happy answer any questions you may have.  Thanks

name: Kelvin Wysinger
text: Awesome Service!!!

resp.text: Thank u very much .. we look forward to your business in the future

name: James Gardner
text: Great business!

resp.text: Thanks James it's always a pleasure to conversate and service your bikes

name: D Boughton
text: Over priced

name: Pam Gann
text: Don't know much about the place

resp.text: Hello Pam we are a Powersports shop Our hours are Tues-Friday 12pm-8pm and Saturday 9am-2pm

text: Live next door

text: Live next door

resp.text: Thank yo very much .. I really appreciate the 5 stars

name: Allan Zbrhodeski
text: The shop crew and service crew were great to work with. I'm a trucker and my delivery to this business, and their employees were very friendly and showed me their hospitality.

name: Chelsea Truett
text: Service center is horrible! Brought our bike in... they had it for 5 months & didn’t do anything. Had it totally taken apart. Called all the time & they blamed it on Covid & problems getting calls back from the dealer & the parts places. Then blamed many other situations. We finally just picked it up because nothing was done. Will never go here again & wouldn’t recommend their service department. Unprofessional & communication is beyond horrible. We know now why it was the only shop in the area that didn’t have a wait list for servicing.

name: Chad Kidd
text: I took a four-wheeler to get the carburetor fixed and also have the oil changed. They did not call and give me a quote ,would also not return a phone call. And they did not even bother to call and tell me that it had been done for a couple weeks. They did not change the oil they charged me $75 for it. Before I left the parking lot I went back inside to tell them the oil had not been changed. . The salesperson took it around back I waited about 30 minutes at least he said it was done I put it on the floor went home when I got home I checked it again and it still has not been changed. If you take something there you will have to be on top of what you paid for and will make sure that they changed the parts.

name: David Solar
text: Very helpful folks. Definitely will be back.

name: Claudia Harlow
text: Great place to do business. I took my Honda Goldmine  in for a running problem and they had me fixed up in no time!

name: Diane Feltner
text:
It was ok
Man in parts was very nice and helpful.

name: donald jackson
text: Horrible service dropped a jet ski off 1 year ago for carbs rebuild pick it up after no communication and now it won't run at all. I would never recommend this place not even to my worst enemy

name: Dewayne Childress
text: The labor price was high.

name: Keith Serafin
text: Cant order anything worth a dam and took forever...

name: Brandon gowan
text: Best deals around and are a pleasure to do business with

name: Eddie Noblitt
text: Great place, very nice folks there to help u with whatever u are looking for. Parts department and salesman very nice willing to help you and gives u good sound advice that will help u with whatever your looking for

name: Alpha and Omega The Creator
text: The employees that run the place will go over and beyond to help their customer.

name: Ric Smith
text: Great location, decent selection and friendly people.

name: Melinda Ridgeway
text: I love this place. Great people working there and will help you until you find what you need. Thank you for helping me today.

name: Jonny Ball
text: Got all my bike fluid change stuff looked at guns and bikes. What more would you need.

name: rs1960Sryan rs1960
text: Not helpful at all.

name: Harold S
text: Great place to shop in Guntersville.  Right close to the lake on 431 and a wide selection

name: Josh Harbin
text: Went in for a throttle cable replacement instead they destroyed my bike! They put selftapping screws in my handle when that happened it cut my wires so now no turn signal or anything! I called 2 days in and I was told that they would call me back well noone did so i called the next day I was told that they will call me back well guess what didn't happen so i showed up with My trailer to get My bike and they were closed at 5:30 online it says 6. Then on day 7 I show up to get it and accordingly my tank leaked out all of the gas and the parts guy told me it was like that when i brought it in "yea right" it was full when I started to argue they went and put gas in it and said that they did it by accident that it leaked out during the night. I brought it in to them and the parts man told me 1-2 days instead it took them 7 days! I will never use this buisness again and I would not recommend this business to my worst enemy they will rip you off and lie to your face worst place in town!

name: Josh Harbin
text: Went in for a throttle cable replacement instead they destroyed my bike! They put selftapping screws in my handle when that happened it cut my wires so now no turn signal or anything! I called 2 days in and I was told that they would call me back well noone did so i called the next day I was told that they will call me back well guess what didn't happen so i showed up with My trailer to get My bike and they were closed at 5:30 online it says 6. Then on day 7 I show up to get it and accordingly my tank leaked out all of the gas and the parts guy told me it was like that when i brought it in "yea right" it was full when I started to argue they went and put gas in it and said that they did it by accident that it leaked out during the night. I brought it in to them and the parts man told me 1-2 days instead it took them 7 days! I will never use this buisness again and I would not recommend this business to my worst enemy they will rip you off and lie to your face worst place in town!

name: james allen
text: i had lgps do routine valve adjustment on my running yz 250 f  they called and said it had no compression and did i want thrm to tear it down. i han to take my tools and show them they put the wrong shims in one intake valve ...zero clearance.  but they did re work it and got it right.   i also had new tires put on my kx rims  the rear one was flat when i got home with it. pleeeease dont train people on my stuff

name: Phillip Lassetter
text: Great place to buy from. Very friendly and with a professional attitude, unlike other stores.

name: Giorgio Torregrosa
text: Excellent staff

name: adam st john
text: Was looking for a helmet. Owner was helpful. Not much variety. But he did offer to order one. Unfortunately, I needed it then.

name: Crystal Ball
text: My husband loves this place. Just bought a Harley fat boy, beautiful and like brand new, very reasonable price, I recommend checking this place out before making a purchase on leather, 4 wheelers, bikes, and even guns here too.

name: Larry Lambert
text: Good place to do business HELPFUL

name: C W
text: Excellent customer service and motorcycle maintenance staff.

name: Bill Stone
text:
Great

We pitched a new jet ski

name: ben-jam-in
text: Only one experience here but it all went well. I had to buy a friend's young son a bday present that would complement the newly acquired dirt bike he was also getting on his bday and I forgot until only a couple days in advance. I rushed to this shop and even though they do more street driven power sports equipment and big side by side's for adults, they still had a cool pair of mx riding gloves for a young kid that even matched his new dirt bike.    It's located in a convenient location right on hwy 431 and not far from the gap going off Sand Mountain into Guntersville.

name: kenneth mote jr
text: I will not be back!! It seems they had rather talk on the phone then deal with the person standing right in front of them.  Cut me off mid question to answer the phone.

name: J G
text: Although they fixed the leaking rear seal, it took them 2 weeks to do it and my bike came with a cracked fender. Of course "they didn't do it" because, in 8 hours they reviewed 80 hours worth of video??? BS. I know it wasn't cracked before it went in because we had just removed the rear seat & saddle bags to detail the bike and that was when we discovered the leak. No apology, no offer to repair. Go to All Pro Powersports in Huntsville or Smith Bros on Oneonta. Both are worth the drive!

name: Arlen Moore
text: The guys are knowledgeable and helpful. They take care of me and my bike very well

name: Ryan Prince
text: Nice workers very helpful. Great bikes.(ask to see bikes for sale in garage in the back)

name: Todd Smith
text: Scott and Lonnie take care of business.  If you want something for nothing though or are a snowflake that gets offended by the blue sky, shop elsewhere.  This is my kind of bike shop.  And they sell guns too.  I've bought three here!

name: mass mayhem
text: This is the place to go if you want to be ripped off. Such a great place to throw dollar bills away. If you don't like money and have plenty of it, go to Lake Guntersville Power Sports.

name: jeromy johnson
text: Nice staff. Nice atvs and bikes.

name: Cody Spencer
text: I have been to power sport many times in the past. today i got my tires changed for my dirt bike. So I brought in the new tired and old set had to wait almost all day and was charged hundred two dollars. I race go through alot of tires never before have I been ripped off that bad. Let's hope I do not get flat first time out. Never again will I go there horrible customer service.

name: Kristin Watson
text: When we go there for parts the staff is always helpful, friendly even if your not buying a lot like some other dealers treat you if you're not buying a 20,000 bike.  If they can't get it, they'll find out where you can.

name: Catfishing 918
text: Awesome!

name: Tracy vandergriff
text:
Bought 2 from them, will never go back !
Bad service dept

name: Darrell Moats
text: Not impressed with the place. Went in to buy a helmet for a young kid. Noone come over to help. After about 15 min I went over to employee and asked where kids helmets were. He more or lesd pointed and told me " over there against the wall" and walked off.

name: Isa Hl
text: Took my bike in for a gas tank repair and it took months to be halfway ready to expensive they charge u for the tools they use too that's ridiculous never go back again,  wish i knew that before, ill not recommend this place they was juts keep telling me the next week, the next week be ready and so on

name: ursula roberts
text: Do a great job and have Kool stuff too

name: Buck S
text: Bad service and shady people. If I was you id find a better place to go.

name: Johnny Payne
text: Great Service

name: allen Henry
text: good place to a bike

name: Rick Jackson
text: Nice clean place

name: Wolf Venable
text: Friendly staff. Competitive prices.

name: Chris Breezy
text: Very helpful!!!

name: Lee Engle
text: Nice bike shop

name: Diane Gomillion
text: A really good place

name: Johnny Corbin
text: Real friendly people

name: Rick Jackson
text: Nice clean place

name: Ivan Westmoreland
text: Very good sales and service

name: Johnny Payne
text: Great Service

name: Deserae Taylor
text: Snooty!! Rude!! Very unwelcoming!! We are looking to get a side by side or 4 wheeler... WILL NOT BE BUYING IT FROM HERE!!

name: Chris Breezy
text: Very helpful!!!

text: Nice people

name: Michael Bowman
text: Good service

name: Deserae Taylor
text: Snooty!! Rude!! Very unwelcoming!! We are looking to get a side by side or 4 wheeler... WILL NOT BE BUYING IT FROM HERE!!

name: Ivan Westmoreland
text: Very good sales and service

name: Tony Herring
text: Selection

name: A Google User
text: Was told over the phone to change the oil in 2 jet skis would be $299 when I arrived it was $499. What a rip off

name: Cathy Young
text: We drove 2.5 hours to purchase our beautiful, new Can Am Spyder RT Sea to Sky from this dealership and it was well worth it. From the very get go, Bree was amazing and straight forward.  We knew what we needed and wanted and she was able to give us it at a price that worked for us. Bree and the team here give: 1) true up front, out the door pricing, 2) a fair amount for trades, 3) no hassle financing and 4) great service all the way around. We appreciated the honesty she gave us from the get go knowing we had been working with another dealership. She never bad mouthed them or tried anything sneaky (can’t say the same for the Big #1) to win our business. She beat them in price and overall customer service. Casey, in finance, was able to get us a deal we could work with, warranties and services we needed and our financing approved quickly. When we arrived everything, to include our bike, was ready to go. When parts we were expecting were not immediately found, Tim, the General Manager, stepped in and started looking and found the part. From first phone call to driving away on our bike, it was a wonderful experience.

name: Doug Loveless
text: The staff are wonderful, Bree was very professional and knowledgeable enjoyed working with her. Casey was witty and made the financing quick and easy. The whole process was slick. Would recommend them to anyone who wants a quick and painless transaction. Thank you

resp.text: Hi Doug Loveless, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at Motorcycle Sport. We're happy we could meet your expectations! Mr. Loveless, reviews like this give us motivation and help us ensure we provide high-quality care. Your recommendation means so much to us and we're so happy to have earned it. Thank you again for taking the time to let the world know about your positive experience. Have a great day!Welcome to the largest family in the Southeast the Motorcycle Sports Family.

name: kenneth mote jr
text: Very pleasant experience!!  The lady at the parts counter is top notch!   She was very friendly and knowledgeable.   She knew exactly what I needed and had it waiting for me when I got there!!   Excellent customer service!!!   I will definitely be back!!   I highly recommend them to everyone!

name: Kendall Welch
text: Thankful I chose to purchase our 2019 Canam Defender from them.   Everyone I spoke with was so nice and helpful.  Bree and Casey were a pleasure to work with, even tho this process was a little more difficult than the usual, they were patient and made things quick and easy.  Thank you to all! We are enjoying our ride.

resp.text: Thank you, Kendall! We work hard to provide our amazing customers with a seamless buying experience. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Bud der
text: Took great care of us. Price was better that all 10 other places I looked! Got exactly what I wanted.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, Bud! We work hard every day to provide the best customer service experience. Thanks again for trusting us to be your powersports dealer.

name: Michael Stevens
text: A place called motorcycle sports should probably have more than a couple bikes to choose from. Seems like they only focus on off road vehicles now. The last 2 times I've been here there selection was awful and their prices were like 20 percent above retail. It's a shame considering what this dealership used to be. Won't be back.

name: Dwayne Oden
text: I had a great experience at Motorcycle Sports. Bre is a truly awesome sales person. She helped me and made sure I was truly happy with my 2021 Can Am Ryker 900.

resp.text: Hi Dwayne Oden, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at Motorcycle Sport. We're happy we could meet your expectations! I will make sure Bree gets this fabulous review and we share it with the team. We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help! Welcome to the Motorcycle Sports family!

name: Gabriel Ivan
text:
Wonderful staff, best prices to buy! Definetly worth driving from Georgia to buy from them!
Jody was the best salesman i ever meet.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Ivan!! We appreciate you being a part of the Motorcycle Sports family!! Enjoy the new Maverick!

name: Dawn Russell
text: Just wanted to Shout Out April in parts!  Amazing gal - friendly, patient and got me all the info I needed to get an accessory for my new Sea Doo!

resp.text: Dawn Russell, thanks for your praise and comments about our team. We will pass along your kind words to April! We sincerely thank you for the positive review, and look forward to seeing you again soon! Welcome to the Motorcycle Sports family.

name: Levy Lawson
text: Motorcycle sports have outstanding staff.Bre is the best salesman I know.she was always there from the beginning to the end.Thanks Bre

resp.text: Hi Levy Lawson, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at Motorcycle Sport. We're happy we could meet your expectations! I am happy to hear Bree took care of you from start to finish. If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day also welcome to the Motorcycle Sports Family.

name: ROBERT PATRICK
text: Best motorcycle and recreational vehicle business on the planet. I've made ATV, Jet-Ski, and multiple motorcycle tire purchases over the years. Sales staff, parts staff, and service staff all professional, accommodating, and friendly. Love witnessing their huge expansion and continued growth.

resp.text: Robert Patrick, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at Motorcycle Sport! We always strive to provide top quality service to every guest, and are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your experience here at Motorcycle Sport!

name: Briana Sawyer
text: Casey was fantastic! She got us in and out so quickly. Great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Briana!!! We hope you and Joseph are enjoying the new ride!! We appreciate your business.

resp.text: Hello, we are glad we could help! We look forward to your next visit! Take care!

name: Mark Brown
text: Professional, courteous and friendly staff. Great facility with plenty of inventory to choose from. Would highly recommend. Ask for Bree, she's the best!

resp.text: Mark Brown, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at Motorcycle Sport! We always strive to provide top quality service to every guest, and are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your experience here at Motorcycle Sport!

name: Deb
text: We were very happy with Dwight and bought a Polaris ranger.  He helped us with out being  pushy as some sales people are. He seemed very honest and got us what we wanted at a fair price. We recommend Dwight. What a great place to shop.

resp.text: Thank you, Deb!!

name: Billy Hall
text: I have bought 2 Can Am Outlander machines from the folks in the last 2 years. Always a friendly staff waiting to help meet my needs. I can really suggest working with these guys!

resp.text: Hi Billy Hall, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at Motorcycle Sport. We're happy we could meet your expectations! We always strive to provide top quality service to every guest, and are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your experience here at Motorcycle Sport!

text: Very friendly and helpful people.

text: great place to shop staff was friendly and there to answer any questions  you would have would recommend to anyone

name: Susan Brown
text: Love this place! I have bought 4 units and have always had a great experience! The service is truly the best!

name: lilmama 44
text: Great sales agents, good prices and friendly service.

resp.text: Hello, we are glad we could help! We look forward to your next visit! Take care!

name: Todd Reid
text: I had the most incredibly positive experience buying my motorcycle from Dwight at M.S.  I made an offer over email from a listing I saw in Cycletrader.  He accepted my offer.  I paid exactly what my offer amount was with no junk fees.  Even the back office was incredibly helpful with the forms for titling in GA.  5 star experience all the way!

resp.text: Thank you, Todd!!!

name: William King
text: Bought my 570 sportsman from Jody and Kim ! Real down to earth folks to deal with. I feel like I got a good product for a fair price and very reasonable payments!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, William! We appreciate your business!

name: Thomas Stapp
text: I had been dealing with another dealership in AL but I could never get the salesman that I was assigned to on the phone. He was always busy but would text me and then not respond for hours at times. I started looking elsewhere and came across Motorcycle Sports and gave them a call and talked to Dwight and he had what I was looking for. Within a few hours Dwight and Kim had me ready to go. They held the unit for me until I could there. I made a 2.5 hr drive and Kim had all paperwork ready to go. Dwight showed me the unit and explained the features and I was ready to go. I also found out 2 days before heading out that a friends uncle has purchased a unit from here a few weekends prior and had a great experience. Dwight and Kim and a few other staff members told me a about a few local riding spots. I highly recommend this dealership and will go back when its time for another one.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Thomas!

name: V Z
text:
**SHADY EBAY SELLER**

This outfit does not honor binding pricing agreements. They cancelled my order because the selling price was apparently too low, only to turn around and relist the same part for much higher. They also took it a step further and FALSIFIED the reason for cancellation, stipulating that it was buyer's request (it was not). Further requests for explanation went ignored.

I can only imagine what goes on inside the business if the dishonesty pervades the online portal.

Consider yourself warned.

resp.text: V Z, we pride ourselves on providing exceptional service, so we are disappointed to hear that your visit with us was anything less than satisfactory. Please call me and we can discuss further. we can not fix the issue without knowing more.  Thanks,

name: Tiffany Thompson
text: Great service and super friendly staff. Two of our friends have recently made purchases and had the same experience.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Tiffany!! We appreciate your continued business over the years.

name: Terry Payton
text: Great selection and very nice folks.

resp.text: Thank you, Terry! We appreciate your business and hope your son enjoys his go cart!

name: Tiffany Adkins
text: Motorcycle sports is awesome !!

resp.text: You're awesome, Tiffany!!! Thank you for your business!

name: Mandy Whitson
text: We could not be happier with our purchase from Motorcycle Sports! Great service and great people!

resp.text: Thank you, Whitson family!!! We hope you're enjoying your Polaris Sportsman!

name: jan hurd
text: The employees are so helpful and the service department is superior.

resp.text: Thank you, Mrs. Hurd! You all are certainly part of our MS family!

name: Hannah Lively
text: If there was an option for no stars I’d definitely put it... This place is over priced on used and new items, and their employees obviously don’t care if they sell you anything or not. They are rude and we will not be doing business with them again. Go to Speedzone in Gadsden if you want to buy anything and not get ripped off.

resp.text: Hannah Lively, we pride ourselves on providing exceptional service, so we are disappointed to hear that your visit with us was anything less than satisfactory. Motorcycle Sports was built on top notch customer service, competitive prices, and after the sale service. We are a family owned business that prides itself on taking care of each customer. Here at Motorcycle Sports, we are always looking for ways to improve; we appreciate your input. If you would be willing, we would like to have you contact our manager Tim  at (256) 831-6495 to discuss ways we can better serve you in the future.

name: Peyton Hall
text: Awesome place

resp.text: Thank you again for taking the time to let us know how we did. We hope you have a great day! We look forward to your next visit! Take care!

name: Tommy Hunter
text: Just bought Can Am defender from this place! They tell you the price and that is what it is, I checked all over the southeast for months and no one can compare to these guys!!!! Thanks again Dwight and staff for making this purchase so easy!!!

resp.text: Thomas Quest, we strive for 100% satisfaction, and it is great to see you had such a positive experience at Motorcycle Sport. If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Snoopy Walden
text: Nice Store! Great Inventory! for your color and choice of side by side CanAm's!

name: j smith
text:
had a windshield when bike went in for tire change bike fell over in their shop broke windshield and would not honor their shop mishap oh they order one and replace it at your expense which was total bs
so be careful when you have to have service on your ride

resp.text: Here at Motorcycle Sport, we strive for excellence, and are disappointed to hear that you received anything less. We wanted to clarify the shop did not damage the windshield and it was not a shop mishap. We felt like we gave you many options for the windshield that was damaged due to you parking the bike improperly. We offered you multiple options to help you replace the windshield and all the options you choose to deny. We are a family owned business that has built its reputation for 20 years on doing the right thing and taking care of the customer in all situations. Our manager Tim would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (256) 831-6495. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Ha'kim Josey
text: I bought my 2nd RZR today from MC Sports and the experience couldn’t have been any better.  Vic and Ashley made my trade-in simple and gave me a fair value.  They were friendly and made the whole experience fun!  I will be back and I recommend everyone to buy from these folks!

resp.text: Thank you, Ha’kim!!! It was a pleasure doing business with you. We appreciate you being such a loyal customer with our dealership.

name: Pat Mason
text: A great company to deal with. I bought my Polaris side by side from them a year ago. Best prices in the south. Excellent service. The staff is excellent, friendly, and helpful. I would definitely buy from them again.

resp.text: Your recommendation means so much to us and we're so happy to have earned it. Thank you again for taking the time to let the world know about your positive experience. Have a great day!

name: Bradley Barker
text: They was quick to help and easy to deal with made the buying process quick and easy. Even stay after hours to help me out!

name: Kristie Roper

resp.text: Kristie, thanks for choosing us for your motorsport needs! We hope to be of service to you again in the future.  Best wishes,  Motorcycle Sports.

resp.text: Marty, thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! Thank you, and have a fantastic day!

name: Taz Branch
text: Was lied to by salesman to my wife & myself ! Got it home & found several screws loose on front plastics.Ive spent over 50k in last year BET I don’t buy another one from them !!😡

resp.text: Taz thank you for the feedback. I wanted to make sure we took care of your issues once you brought them to my attention. The center cap I handled the next day and now that I am aware of the other issue we have it handled. If you have any other issues or concerns that come up please don't hesitate to reach out.  Thanks for your business.

name: Brent wheat
text: Called and told them what I wanted and they had it and all the paperwork ready for me when I got there great service

resp.text: Brent, we are very happy we could provide you with a positive experience! Feel free to reach out to us if you need anything. Have a wonderful day.

name: Jason Cook
text: Broke a tie rod on a Friday night, called Saturday morning right at 8, talked to Christy in parts, they had replacement in stock, she set it aside for me.  No price gouging, awesome customer service, go see them.

resp.text: Jason, we are glad we could help! We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

text: It was so easy to make a purchase. Great staff! Friendly faces and attitudes!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a stellar review, Lacy!!! We appreciate you being a part of the Motorcycle Sports family!! Don't forget to like us on Facebook to stay up to date on new products, sales, events, etc.!

name: chad morris
text: GREAT PLACE TO SHOP.FRIEDLY STAFF.HAD A GREAT EXPERIENCE WHEN PURCHASING MY RZR AND SALES EVEN STAYED LATE TO WAIT ON ME.SERVICE DEPARTMENT AND CHRIS ARE GREAT TO DEAL WITH.JUST HAD A REPAIR DONE AND THEY DID GREAT.CHRISTY IN PARTS HELPED ME GET A PROBLEM RESOLVED WITH SOME TIRES AND WAS GREAT TO DEAL WITH.I WOULD SAY IF YOUR WANTING A SIDE BY SIDE OR ATV THAT THIS IS THE BEST PLACE TO SHOP.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, Chad!! We appreciate you and your business. If you ever need anything else, you know we will always be here for you. Also, don't forget to follow us on Facebook to stay up to date on events and promotions! ;)

name: Eric Hawkins
text: If you are wanting to purchase a motorcycle or ATV, this may be the place to go. If you are wanting someone to repair your motorcycle or ATV, KEEP SHOPPING AROUND. I took my motorcycle to have the carburetors rebuilt. After spending about $700, the bike spewed fuel from a ruptured fuel line all of the way home. The service manager said that it must have leaked before it was dropped off. It didn't. The mechanics do not stand behind their work and the labor prices are outrageous.

name: Dan Rains
text: Very good . I'll do business with them again.

resp.text: Thank you, Dan!! So happy to hear you had a great experience. We appreciate your business!!
